title: Adding saved cover letter paragraphs
subtitle: Save paragraphs to cut down on copying and pasting
description: Saved cover letter paragraphs are a good way to re-use standard paragraphs such as opening statements, descriptions of past work, and closers or signatures.

steps.description: Click on 'My Info' in the top bar or side menu.
Click on the (+) button at the top of the page (bottom of the page if on mobile).
Fill out some information about the pargraph as well as the full paragraph description.

steps: Click on 'My Info' in the top bar or side menu.
Click on the paragraph card that includes the information you want to edit.
Edit the information in the fields provided.
Click on 'My Info' in the top bar or side menu.
Click on the paragraph card that you want to delete.
